name: Anton FTP Client
body:
This is a simple FTP Client based on [ArxOne FTP Client library] (https://github.com/ArxOne/FTP).


## It's main features include:

+ Browsing public and private FTP sites
+ Ability to recursively evaluate disk space usage
+ Address book which can be saved and loaded from disk
+ Caching of remote directories to speed up browsing

## Features not currently supported:

- Downloading or uploading of files
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
